title: At least 7 people killed in Kherson city due to Russian shelling, Ukrainian official says
A 16-foot reticulated python was rescued in Texas after being missing for months
description: An "unhappy" 16-foot albino reticulated python was rescued by an animal shelter in Austin, Texas on Monday -- after being missing for months.

title: Maxi Jazz, lead singer of dance group Faithless, dies at 65
description: Maxi Jazz, the British musician best known as the lead vocalist for dance group Faithless, has died, according to the band.

title: Why everyone is suddenly talking about buccal fat removal
description: Buccal fat removal might just be the new Brazilian butt lift -- aka the newest cosmetic surgery procedure to take over social media.

title: Here's how to track Santa around the world, thanks to NORAD
description: Santa Claus has packed his sleigh with toys for all the good kids and he has made sure the reindeer are secured for takeoff. Now, they are traveling around the world to visit millions of households.

title: Taliban orders NGOs to ban female employees from coming to work
description: The Taliban administration in Afghanistan has ordered all local and international non-governmental organizations (NGOs) to stop their female employees from coming to work, according to a letter by the Ministry of Economy sent to all licensed NGOs.

title: Brutal winter storm creates continuing chaos for flights, holiday packages
description: Flight delays continued Saturday, interrupting travel during the busy holiday season as parts of the country were battered by a deadly winter storm.

title: Nurse becomes a living organ donor for her mom -- twice
description: Marzena Stasieluk needed a new kidney. She'd been diagnosed with kidney disease in 2015, and ultimately needed dialysis, a grueling process where a machine did the work her kidneys could no longer do.

title: What to say when someone lobs a horrible comment your way over holiday dinner, according to experts
description: The table is set, friends and family draw near, and you already know what comments or questions are going to come your way.

title: 2 never-before-seen minerals found in huge asteroid that fell to Earth
description: Scientists have identified two minerals never before seen on Earth in a meteorite weighing 15.2 metric tons (33,510 pounds).

title: At least 7 people killed in Kherson city due to Russian shelling, Ukrainian official says
Police and protesters clash in Paris after fatal shooting at Kurdish community center
description: Clashes between protesters and police have broken out in central Paris on Saturday, as members of the local Kurdish community took to the streets to call for justice following Friday's deadly shooting at a Kurdish cultural center.

title: Brexit has cracked Britain's economic foundations
description: It's been two years since former Prime Minister Boris Johnson signed his Brexit trade deal and triumphantly declared that Britain would be "prosperous, dynamic and contented" after completing its exit from the European Union.

title: 19-year-old killed in a shooting at the largest shopping center in the US
description: A 19-year-old man was killed Friday in a shooting during an altercation at the Mall of America in Minnesota, the nation's largest shopping and entertainment center, police said.

title: England's Phillips returned from World Cup overweight, says Guardiola
description: England midfielder Kalvin Phillips returned from the World Cup overweight and not in the right condition to play, Manchester City coach Pep Guardiola has said.

title: How the Jan 6 panel unearthed key details from little-known insiders
description: The story of January 6 has largely focused on a cast of very prominent characters, including former President Donald Trump and members of his inner circle who have become household names, like his former attorney Rudy Giuliani and his White House chief of staff Mark Meadows.

title: A powerful winter storm claims at least 11 lives across the US as temperatures plunge, winds howl and power lines fall
description: Hundreds of thousands of Americans are waking up in the dark to unlit trees on Christmas Eve, after destructive winds and heavy snow from a winter storm tore down power lines and endangered drivers across the country, killing at least 11 people in its path.

title: NFL Week 16 preview: Pittsburgh Steelers to honor Franco Harris on bittersweet day for franchise
description: When the Pittsburgh Steelers host the LA Raiders on Sunday, it will be one of those rare moments in sport where the result won't really matter.

title: Alex Ovechkin is now 2nd all-time in NHL career goals, trails only Wayne Gretzky's record
description: A pair of goals from Washington Capitals star Alex Ovechkin on Friday secured yet another feat in his surefire Hall of Fame career, passing hockey legend Gordie Howe for the second-most goals scored in NHL history.

title: Pelé's daughter shares moving photo with her father in hospital
description: The daughter of Brazilian football legend Pelé took to Instagram late Friday to post a moving tribute and picture of her father at the Albert Einstein Jewish Hospital in São Paulo.

title: At least nine people dead across the United States during severe winter weather
They were welcomed into British homes. Celebrating their first Christmas together, Ukrainians wonder if that hospitality will last
description: Last year, Nataliia Doroshko, a 35-year-old lawyer, celebrated St. Nicholas Day with friends and family in her home city of Cherkasy, on the snowy banks of the Dnipro River, downstream from the Ukrainian capital Kyiv.

title: Millions have the same 'bendy body' disease as my daughter. Why isn't the medical profession paying more attention?
description: One day in July 2021, my then 15-year-old daughter Poppy stumbled and fell while walking down some stairs, grazing her knee. It wasn't a serious wound, but over the weeks it didn't heal.

title: 'We're born with this and will never be free:' Hear stories from people with Ehlers-Danlos syndrome
description: Ehlers-Danlos syndrome (EDS) is a group of genetic disorders that affect the body's connective tissue, resulting in a wide range of debilitating symptoms. Hear from five people who are living with EDS.

title: English cricketer Sam Curran becomes most expensive buy in Indian Premier League auction history
description: English cricketer Sam Curran has become the most expensive auction buy in the history of the Indian Premier League (IPL) -- after being sold to the Punjab Kings for 18.5 crore rupees ($2.22 million).

title: Crypto was billed as a vehicle to wealth. For many Black investors, it's been anything but
description: Just a few short months ago, venture capital firms, celebrities and even some elected officials were hailing cryptocurrency as the future of personal finance, an investment vehicle that could turn modest nest eggs into massive fortunes.

title: Leaked notes from China estimate 250 million Covid infections in December: reports
description: Almost 250 million people in China may have caught Covid-19 in the first 20 days of December, according to an internal estimate from the nation's top health officials, Bloomberg News and the Financial Times reported Friday.

title: What it's like to live on Christmas Island
description: "The jungle is our playground, and the sea is our wonderland."

title: The Taliban pledged to honor women's rights in Afghanistan. Here's how it eroded them instead
description: When the Taliban returned to power in Afghanistan in August 2021 in a lightning takeover following the withdrawal of US troops, the radical Islamist group appeared keen to distance itself from its earlier period of rule in the 1990s, presenting itself as more moderate and committed to the internal peace process.

title: Spanish whisky commercial has a twist that moved viewers to tears
description: This Spanish J&B Whisky commercial with an emotional storyline about the acceptance of a trans family member has gotten millions of views on YouTube.

title: NFL review of DeVante Parker's head injury finds no protocol violations
description: A review into New England Patriots wide receiver DeVante Parker's head injury found no violations of the National Football League's concussion protocol, the NFL and NFL Players Association announced Friday in a joint statement.

title: Tory Lanez found guilty in 2020 shooting of Megan Thee Stallion
description: A Los Angeles jury on Friday found rapper and singer Tory Lanez guilty of three charges related to the July 2020 shooting of fellow rapper Megan Thee Stallion in the Hollywood Hills, the Los Angeles County District Attorney said.
